00131 // The MibMethodCall class stores function pointers of the class Mib
00132 
00133 class AGENTPP_DECL MibMethodCall {
00134 
00135 public:
00136   MibMethodCall(Mib* c, 
00137                 void (Mib::*m) (Request *),
00138                 Request* r): 
00139 
00140         called_class(c), method(m), req(r) {
00141   }
00142 
00143   MibMethodCall(const MibMethodCall& other) {
00144 
00145         called_class    = other.called_class;
00146         method          = other.method;
00147         req             = other.req;
00148   }
00149     
00150   Mib*          called_class;
00151   mib_method_t  method; 
00152   Request*      req;
00153 };

00193  class AGENTPP_DECL Runnable {
00194    
00195  public:
00196         Runnable() { }
00197         virtual ~Runnable()  { }
00198 
00204         virtual void run() = 0;
00205  };

00214  class AGENTPP_DECL Synchronized {
00215 public:
00216         Synchronized();
00217         ~Synchronized();
00218 
00224         void            wait();
00225 
00237         boolean         wait(unsigned long timeout);    
00238 
00243         void            notify();
00248         void            notify_all();
00249 
00253         void            lock();
00254 
00261         boolean         trylock();
00262 
00266         void            unlock();
00267 
00268  private:
00269 #ifdef POSIX_THREADS
00270         int             cond_timed_wait(const timespec*);
00271         pthread_cond_t  cond;
00272         pthread_mutex_t monitor;
00273 #else
00274 #ifdef WIN32
00275         char            numNotifies;
00276         HANDLE          semEvent;
00277         HANDLE          semMutex;
00278         boolean         isLocked;
00279 #endif
00280 #endif
00281 
00282  };

00294  class AGENTPP_DECL Lock {
00295  public:
00303         Lock (Synchronized &s):sync(s) { sync.lock();   }
00304 
00309         ~Lock()                        { sync.unlock(); }
00310 
00311         
00321         void            wait (long timeout) 
00322                         { if (timeout<0) sync.wait(); else sync.wait(timeout);}
00323 
00328         void            notify ()      { sync.notify (); }
00329 
00330  private:
00331         Synchronized &sync;
00332  };

00334  class AGENTPP_DECL ThreadList;
00335 
00352  class AGENTPP_DECL Thread : public Synchronized, public Runnable {
00353 
00354         enum ThreadStatus { IDLE, RUNNING, FINISHED }; 
00355 
00356         friend class Synchronized;
00357 #ifdef WIN32
00358         friend DWORD thread_starter(LPDWORD lpdwParam);
00359 #else
00360         friend void* thread_starter(void*);
00361 #endif
00362  public:
00366         Thread();
00367 
00374         Thread(Runnable &r);
00375 
00380         virtual ~Thread() { if (status != IDLE) join(); }
00381 
00389         static  void      sleep(long millis);
00390 
00401         static  void      sleep(long millis, int nanos);
00402 
00410         virtual void      run();
00411 
00420         Runnable&         get_runnable();
00421 
00425         void              join();
00426 
00431         void              start();
00432 
00440         void              set_stack_size(long s) { stackSize = s; } 
00441 
00448         boolean           is_alive() { return (status == RUNNING); }
00449 
00454         Thread*         clone() { return new Thread(get_runnable()); }
00455         
00456  private:
00457         Runnable*         runnable;
00458         ThreadStatus      status;
00459         long              stackSize;
00460 #ifdef POSIX_THREADS
00461         pthread_t         tid;
00462 #else
00463 #if WIN32
00464         HANDLE            threadHandle;
00465         DWORD             tid;
00466 #endif
00467 #endif
00468         static ThreadList threadList; 
00469         static void       nsleep(int secs, long nanos);
00470  };
00471

00480 #if !defined (AGENTPP_DECL_TEMPL_ARRAY_THREAD)
00481 #define AGENTPP_DECL_TEMPL_ARRAY_THREAD
00482         AGENTPP_DECL_TEMPL template class AGENTPP_DECL Array<Thread>;
00483 #endif
00484 
00485  class AGENTPP_DECL ThreadList : public Synchronized {
00486  public:
00487         ThreadList() { }
00488         ~ThreadList() { list.clear(); /* do no delete threads */ }
00489 
00490         void    add(Thread* t)          { lock(); list.add(t); unlock(); }
00491         void    remove(Thread* t)       { lock(); list.remove(t); unlock(); }
00492         int     size() const            { return list.size(); }
00493         Thread* last() { lock(); Thread* t = list.last(); unlock(); return t; }
00494 
00495  protected:   
00496         Array<Thread> list; 
00497  };

00515  class AGENTPP_DECL ThreadPool : public Synchronized {
00516 
00517  protected:
00518         Array<TaskManager> taskList;
00519         int stackSize;
00520  public:
00528         ThreadPool(int size = 4);
00529 
00530         
00541         ThreadPool(int size, int stackSize);
00542 
00546         virtual ~ThreadPool();
00547 
00552         virtual void    execute(Runnable*);
00553 
00561         boolean is_idle();
00562 
00568         unsigned int size() { return taskList.size(); }
00569 
00576         int     stack_size() { return stackSize; }
00577 
00581         virtual void    idle_notification() { lock(); notify(); unlock(); }
00582  };

00604  class AGENTPP_DECL QueuedThreadPool : public ThreadPool, public Thread {

00609  public:
00617         QueuedThreadPool(int size = 4);
00618

00630         QueuedThreadPool(int size, int stackSize);
00631 
00635         virtual ~QueuedThreadPool();
00636 
00641         void    execute(Runnable*);
00642 
00649         unsigned int queue_length() { return queue.size(); }
00650 
00651 
00655         void    run();
00656 
00660         void    stop()          { go = FALSE; }
00661 
00665         virtual void    idle_notification();
00666 
00667  private:

00669  };

00679  class AGENTPP_DECL TaskManager : public Synchronized, public Runnable {
00680  public:
00690         TaskManager(ThreadPool*, 
00691                     int stackSize = AGENTPP_DEFAULT_STACKSIZE);
00692 
00696         virtual ~TaskManager();
00697 
00698         
00706         boolean is_idle()       { return (!task); }
00707 
00711         void    start()         { thread.start(); }
00712 
00716         void    stop()          { go = FALSE; }
00717 
00729         boolean  set_task(Runnable*);
00730 
00734         TaskManager*    clone() 
00735             { return new TaskManager(
00736                 new ThreadPool(threadPool->size(), threadPool->stack_size()));}
00737 
00738  protected:
00739         Thread          thread;
00740         ThreadPool*     threadPool;
00741         Runnable*       task;
00742         void            run();
00743         boolean         go;
00744  };

00753  class AGENTPP_DECL MibTask: public Runnable {
00754  public:
00755         MibTask(MibMethodCall* call) { task = call; }
00756         virtual ~MibTask() { delete task; }
00757         
00758         virtual void run();
00759  protected:
00760         MibMethodCall* task;
00761  };
